facts.text: Port Valor is a bustling harbor city on Valor Bay known for shipyards and trade.
The Crooked Tavern is a weathered sailors' tavern near the docks of Port Valor.
Aldric is a 45-year-old tavern keeper known for being observant and gruff.
Aldric lost his father to a storm at sea when he was twelve.
Aldric has run the Crooked Tavern for about twenty years after inheriting it from his uncle.
The Salt Road connects Port Valor to Grayfall and carries most inland salt trade.
The Lantern Guild maintains the lighthouses that guide ships into Valor Bay.
The merchant sloop Blackkeel vanished during the Storm of Years with no survivors found.
Ironwatch is the official city guard of Port Valor and patrols the docks nightly.
Whisper Market is a night bazaar hidden beneath the old docks where rare goods appear.
Valor Bay is known for sudden fog banks in early autumn that can hide reefs.
Grayfall is an inland town that supplies salt to Port Valor via the Salt Road.
